EmailTemplate.name: Complaints Email Receipt
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c}
Thank you for your email.
This is an automated acknowledgement confirming receipt of your request which will be attended to shortly.
Operating hours: Our operating hours are from Monday to Friday 07:30 - 17:00.
Thank you
